def.dt: :happening once a year The annual meeting is in July. It's time for your annual [=yearly] checkup. The company's earnings for last year are published in the annual report.
:covering the period of a year We had more snow this year than the average annual amount. The company charges an annual fee of $45.
:living for only one year or season :having a life cycle that is one year or season long annual plants/herbs/flowers compare biennial perennial

utxt.vi: We meet annually [=once a year] in July.
A report of the company's earnings is published annually.

def.dt: :a plant that lives for only one year or season We planted some annuals in front of the house. compare biennial perennial
:a book or magazine that is published once a year
